#Text=CanadaVOTES : CHP candidate Vicki Gunn in York — Simcoe
#Text=Friday , October 10 , 2008
#Text=In an attempt to speak with as many candidates as possible during the 2008 Canadian federal election , Wikinews has talked via email with Vicki Gunn .
#Text=Gunn is a candidate in Ontario 's York — Simcoe riding , running under the Christian Heritage Party of Canada ( CHP ) banner .
#Text=The CHP is a minor , registered political party running a significant number of candidates across the country , looking to earn its first ever seat in the House of Commons .
#Text=The riding has existed from 1968 to 1979 , from 1988 to 1997 , and from 2004 to present .
#Text=As of the next provincial election in Ontario , it will be recognised as a provincial electoral district as well .

#Text=Over the years , the riding has been represented by the Liberal Party , Progressive Conservative Party , again by the Progressive Conservatives , again by the Liberals , and since its recreation , the seat has been held by the Conservative Party of Canada .
#Text=Peter Van Loan , the Conservative incumbent , is the Minister Responsible for Democratic Reform and Leader of the Government in the House of Commons .
#Text=The other candidates in the riding , besides Van Loan and the CHP 's Gunn , are New Democrat Sylvia Gerl , Liberal Judith Moses , and the Green Party 's John Dewar .
#Text=The following is an interview with Gunn , conducted via email .
#Text=The interview is published unedited , as sent to Wikinews .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why are you running for political office , why at the federal level , why this party , and why in this riding ?
#Text=I am serving for the 3rd time as candidate because I believe in principles which do not change .
#Text=I believe in strong families and I believe is social order .
#Text=When we as a country supported our families and enabled them to raise their children without fear of government interference then we had a strong social order .
#Text=We had 4 levels of government , self government , family government , church ( spiritual ) government , and civil government ) which created healthy , balanced social order .
#Text=The government did not interfere in family and spiritual government unless there was good reason .
#Text=Today we have government interference in our homes , in our places of worship , in our thoughts , how we express ourselves .
#Text=This is a dangerous precedent !
#Text=Government has been allowed to grow unfettered in this country for too long .
#Text=The CHP genuinely believes in 4 levels of government ... each operating within it 's sphere of authority .
#Text=We believe in smaller government .
#Text=We believe in healthy families .
#Text=We believe in a future for this country free from the all pervasive power of the state !
#Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=I served as candidate in York Simcoe for the Christian Heritage Party in both 2004 & 2006 .
